overview: You know you want it! Mommy Claudia as an idea: ask her step daughter Cassidy if she would consider taking her step brother's virginity. Cadence Lux refuses to put on clothes when she opens the door for her big brother Johnny Castle. Ariella was head cheerleader in high school and married Johnny because he was the most popular, but now she wants his brother Brad Knight. When step brother Markus Dupree returns home after four years in Russia, Lily Adams sure hopes he notices how much her body has developed since then.
title: Take Your Brother's Virginity
